name: Room Scape with steve & pete
description:
I started in video game development less than three months ago.

I thought I would participate in the JAM with a team but in the end they could not participate. So I challenged myself to participate without a team in GMTK Jam. I hope you like the game. I would love for you to give me your feedback and help me improve.

 I was going to add other features but the time is not enough, among the features that I wanted to add are:

  • breakable tiles
  • buttons to remove boxes or plug holes
  • breakable boxes
  • more 4x4,5x5 and 6x6 maps.

It will be for another occasion and greater experience. making this game in just under 15 hours was a lot of fun.

One small bug - you don't fall down the holes after sliding over ice.  (it's fixed but i cannot upload it until votations ends!).
